channel.title: CVE Feed for SAP SE -- SAP ERP HCM (Portugal)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SAP SE -- SAP ERP HCM (Portugal)

item.title: CVE-2022-22535|2024-08-03T03:14:55.475Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20erp%20hcm%20%28portugal%29
item.description: SAP ERP HCM Portugal - versions 600, 604, 608, does not perform necessary authorization checks for a report that reads the payroll data of employees in a certain area. Since the affected report only reads the payroll information, the attacker can neither modify any information nor cause availability impacts.
